metadata.title: CVE-2022-46725 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A spoofing issue existed in the handling of URLs. This issue was addressedwith improved input validation. This issue is fixed in iOS 16.4 and iPadOS16.4. Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
